name: All The Stars in Texas
description:
Create your own unique heist scenario using a deck of cards, then solve it in ONE MINUTE!

Plunder pirate treasure, rescue a loved one from an evil sheriff or steal the most powerful weapon in the galaxy, the only limit is your imagination! With over a hundred different mechanical combination and near infinite ways the game can play out, AtSiT can be slipped into a standard deck of cards, and takes One Minute to set up and One Minute to play!

♣♥♠♦

This game was created for the One-Minute Jam, in which I added the caveat that the game's rules had to fit on a single Playing Card (more specifically a Bicycle Poker Size playing card: 2.5 by 3.5 inches)

♣♥♠♦

Thanks to Hannah for helping with the concept and first draft, Logan for the playtesting and to Ludo for the title inspiration
